title: PM Service Planner – Branch Automation Suite
author: Austin Monson
overview: Automates PM service data processing for Hayden Machinery branches.
Splits raw INCUS5 exports, applies branch formatting, archives previous data.
Preserves notes (Due/Notes) by Stock # and filters corrected/removed items.
changelog: v1.3.0 – Info tab automation + GitHub sync
v1.4.0 – PROJECT_INFO fully remote; latest commit SHA shown on Information tab
working: Springfield machine data list sorted, allows notes and categorization.
Integrates conditional formatting from Springfield template.
Tabs are archived on update and can be restored via menu.
All notes and categorizations are retained when working tabs are updated.
pending: Additional working tabs for Villa Ridge and West Plains branches.
Functional upload dialog to allow direct upload of raw INCUS5 data to update working sheets.
Google Calendar integration for quick job/work order sharing.
"Top 20" list per branch ordered by most overdue service (one service per machine).
limitations: Requires credential verification and permissions on first use.
